Subject: RE: After installing the Linux agent it's not showing the console
Description: We are installed the agent on the ubuntu machine 22.04 we have successfully installed but it's showing reflecting in console and device, kindly provide prompt support.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Try to install a Ubuntu client in a environment that has no internet connection.
What_We_Know__c:
The customer has set up a installation on a computer that doesn't have any internet connection.
When installing the client, some packages could not get to the targeted URL links and therefor went on error.
Next_Steps__c: Guiding the customer on how the client installation needs to be performed on UbuntuOS.
Solution_Comment__c: Guided the customer on how the client installation needs to be performed on UbuntuOS.
